title: Drawing, "Mountainous Landscape with a Waterfall, near Tuquerres, Colombia", August 1853
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on light brown paper.
markings:
Watermark: [I with a "-"over top]OHANNOT
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left:  Lugt 457e
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center: Lugt 457c and Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at lower right: A bit of scenery on the road [struck out: bettween] near Tuquerres Recollection / Aug / 53
description: Horizontal view of a water fall at the center plateau in the middleground with mountain peaks in the background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mountainous Landscape with a Waterfall, near Tuquerres, Colombia", August 1853.
August 1853. Graphite, brush and white gouache on light brown paper.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-855.
